00026 #ifndef NOISEPP_ADDITION_H
00027 #define NOISEPP_ADDITION_H
00028 
00029 #include "NoisePipeline.h"
00030 #include "NoiseModule.h"
00031 
00032 namespace noisepp
00033 {
00034         class AdditionElement1D : public PipelineElement1D
00035         {
00036                 private:
00037                         ElementID mLeft, mRight;
00038                         const PipelineElement1D *mLeftPtr;
00039                         const PipelineElement1D *mRightPtr;
00040 
00041                 public:
00042                         AdditionElement1D (const Pipeline1D *pipe, ElementID left, ElementID right) : mLeft(left), mRight(right)
00043                         {
00044                                 mLeftPtr = pipe->getElement (mLeft);
00045                                 mRightPtr = pipe->getElement (mRight);
00046                         }
00047                         virtual Real getValue (Real x, Cache *cache) const
00048                         {
00049                                 Real value;
00050                                 value = getElementValue (mLeftPtr, mLeft, x, cache);
00051                                 value += getElementValue (mRightPtr, mRight, x, cache);
00052                                 return value;
00053                         }
00054         };
00055 
00056         class AdditionElement2D : public PipelineElement2D
00057         {
00058                 private:
00059                         ElementID mLeft, mRight;
00060                         const PipelineElement2D *mLeftPtr;
00061                         const PipelineElement2D *mRightPtr;
00062 
00063                 public:
00064                         AdditionElement2D (const Pipeline2D *pipe, ElementID left, ElementID right) : mLeft(left), mRight(right)
00065                         {
00066                                 mLeftPtr = pipe->getElement (mLeft);
00067                                 mRightPtr = pipe->getElement (mRight);
00068                         }
00069                         virtual Real getValue (Real x, Real y, Cache *cache) const
00070                         {
00071                                 Real value;
00072                                 value = getElementValue (mLeftPtr, mLeft, x, y, cache);
00073                                 value += getElementValue (mRightPtr, mRight, x, y, cache);
00074                                 return value;
00075                         }
00076         };
00077 
00078         class AdditionElement3D : public PipelineElement3D
00079         {
00080                 private:
00081                         ElementID mLeft, mRight;
00082                         const PipelineElement3D *mLeftPtr;
00083                         const PipelineElement3D *mRightPtr;
00084 
00085                 public:
00086                         AdditionElement3D (const Pipeline3D *pipe, ElementID left, ElementID right) : mLeft(left), mRight(right)
00087                         {
00088                                 mLeftPtr = pipe->getElement (mLeft);
00089                                 mRightPtr = pipe->getElement (mRight);
00090                         }
00091                         virtual Real getValue (Real x, Real y, Real z, Cache *cache) const
00092                         {
00093                                 Real value;
00094                                 value = getElementValue (mLeftPtr, mLeft, x, y, z, cache);
00095                                 value += getElementValue (mRightPtr, mRight, x, y, z, cache);
00096                                 return value;
00097                         }
00098         };
00099 
00103         class AdditionModule : public DualSourceModule<AdditionElement1D, AdditionElement2D, AdditionElement3D>
00104         {
00105                 public:
00107                         ModuleTypeId getType() const { return MODULE_ADDITION; }
00108         };
00109 };
00110 
00111 #endif
